titleStmt.title: Remaines of a greater worke, concerning Britaine, the inhabitants thereof, their languages, names, surnames, empreses, wise speeches, poësies, and epitaphes
Remaines concerning Britain
titleStmt.author: Camden, William, 1551-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] E[ld] for Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: M.N., i.e. William Camden.
Subsequent editions published as: Remaines concerning Britaine.
Reproduction of the original in Yale University. Library.
